channel.title: Adding NPC's that say weather or not your online in PimpScape?
channel.description: I've always wanted to know how to do it, lol. I want to have Verac the Defiled & Ahrim the Blighted saying if I'm offlie or not. Would appreciate a response ASAP, thanks!

item.title: Adding NPC's that say weather or not your online in PimpScape?
item.dc:creator: @Odimaru Odimaru
item.description:
@Odimaru wrote:

OK, 1 second, I’ll try it.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding NPC's that say weather or not your online in PimpScape?

item.title: Adding NPC's that say weather or not your online in PimpScape?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

In autospawn.cfg go to the last line where it says END OF AUTOSPAWN or something like that and press enter. Paste this above it spawn = 2862 XXXX YYYY 0 0 0 0 0 1 Death You need to put the X coords to the X place and Y coords to the Y.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding NPC's that say weather or not your online in PimpScape?
item.dc:creator: @Odimaru Odimaru
item.description:
@Odimaru wrote:

Could you um… Perhaps… Give me the line it would look like if I wanted Death to say this? I mean, I can see where it goes but i’ve never messed with this file before…[br][size=1]Posted on: March 21, 2007, 12:11:08 PM[/size][hr]I want 2 of them, both on each side of the door outside of the Varrock East bank.

item.title: Adding NPC's that say weather or not your online in PimpScape?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

[quote=“Odimaru, post:8, topic:69598”]npcs[i].textUpdate = “Moo”;
}
}
} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552)
{
if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay
{
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“Odimaru”))
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Odimaru is ONLINE”;
}
else
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Odimaru is OFFLINE”;
}
}

Should it look like that when done?[/quote]
It should look like this. The 1552 is Santa, change it to whatever you want.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding NPC's that say weather or not your online in PimpScape?

item.title: Adding NPC's that say weather or not your online in PimpScape?
item.dc:creator: @Odimaru Odimaru
item.description:
@Odimaru wrote:

npcs[i].textUpdate = “Moo”;
}
}
} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 0000)
{
if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay
{
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“admin”))
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Admin is ONLINE”;
}
else
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Admin is OFFLINE”;
}
}

Should it look like that when done?

Read full topic
item.source: Adding NPC's that say weather or not your online in PimpScape?

item.title: Adding NPC's that say weather or not your online in PimpScape?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

[quote=“Eh Pretty Easy, post:2, topic:69598”]In NPCHandler.java search for “moo” without quotes and after the second } add this } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 0000) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("admin")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Admin is ONLINE"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Admin is OFFLINE"; } } Just replace the Admins with your name.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Adding NPC's that say weather or not your online in PimpScape?

item.title: Adding NPC's that say weather or not your online in PimpScape?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Omfg… put the Npc Id into the place where it says 0000 and then put the npc in the autospawn.cfg and spawn it to the place you want it to be and then it should say that.

item.source: Adding NPC's that say weather or not your online in PimpScape?

item.title: Adding NPC's that say weather or not your online in PimpScape?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

In NPCHandler.java search for “moo” without quotes and after the second } add this } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 0000) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("admin")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Admin is ONLINE"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Admin is OFFLINE"; } } Just replace the Admins with your name.

Read full topic
